longBusinessSummary: Grand River Commerce, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Grand River Bank that provides various commercial and consumer banking products and services to businesses, professionals, and residents in Michigan. It operates through Commercial Real Estate; Commercial and Industrial; and Consumer segments. The company offers deposit products comprising interest and noninterest-bearing checking accounts, savings accounts, and time deposits; and residential lot, land, and construction financing services. It also provides lending products, such as real estate mortgages, consumer, commercial, industrial, commercial term, home equity term, car, boat, motorcycle, and RV loans, as well as commercial and home equity lines of credit, and SBA lending products; and community investment, federal housing administration, rural development, veterans, bridge, physician, doctor, and dentist loans. In addition, the company offers treasury management, merchant, ACH manager, estatements, remote deposit capture, courier, night depository, online banking, bill pay, mobile deposit and banking, and refinancing services; and debit and credit cards. Grand River Commerce, Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Grandville, Michigan.
